Boomerang Fu

Chaotic party brawler where food friends slice each other with boomerangs.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Party matches; ideal for short bursts.
  • Controller required: Yes
  • Local co-op: Yes
  • Best with 2–4 controllers in local play.
  • Fast rounds, quick restarts.

Where to buy / play at home

  • Green Man Gaming
  • Fanatical
  • Humble Store
  • Amazon (Switch / eShop code)
  • Steam
  • Epic Games (creator code)
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes Best with 2–4 controllers in local play., Fast rounds, quick restarts.
PC Yes Local multiplayer with rule variants, High framerates, controller remapping
Xbox Yes Local multiplayer; achievements
PlayStation Yes Local multiplayer; trophies
Switch Yes Portable couch chaos with Joy-Con
Mobile No —

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.
  • Home versions save locally/platform cloud within each ecosystem.

Features

  • Local co-op: Yes
  • Online co-op (native): No
  • Controller recommended: Yes

Recommended hardware

  • xbox controller
  • ps5 dualsense
  • usb hub

Notes

  • Great showpiece for quick couch battles at home with 3–4 players.
